snippet: Southwest Airlines earned a record profit last year, and its chief executive benefited with a 24 percent increase in compensation, to $5 million.
abstract: Regulatory filing shows that Southwest Airlines earned record profit in 2014 and increased compensation to chief executive Gary C Kelly by 24 percent, to $5 million; airline earned net income of $1.14 billion.
lead_paragraph: Southwest Airlines earned a record profit last year, and its chief executive benefited with a 24 percent increase in compensation, to $5 million.

headline.main: Southwest Airlines Earned a Record Profit Last Year, and Its Chief Executive Benefited
headline.print_headline: Southwest Airlines Chief Gets 24% Pay Increase
